concept.title: Destinations
concept.shortdesc: A destination stage represents the target data for the pipeline. You can use one or more destinations in a pipeline.

conbody.p:
You can use the following types of destinations in a pipeline:
Hadoop FS - Writes data to a file system on Hadoop.
Kafka Producer - Writes data to a Kakfa cluster.
Records to File - Writes records to a local file system.
Trash - Removes data from the pipeline.
